body_html:
@Balandat Is it possible for you to get a benchmark of the current version? I see a 2x improvement on my local machine after a minor modification by replacing select by indexing from a std::vector instead.

Plus, I have now added CUDA support (untested).
body_text:
@Balandat Is it possible for you to get a benchmark of the current version? I see a 2x improvement on my local machine after a minor modification by replacing select by indexing from a std::vector instead.
Plus, I have now added CUDA support (untested).
body:
@Balandat Is it possible for you to get a benchmark of the current version? I see a 2x improvement on my local machine after a minor modification by replacing `select` by indexing from a `std::vector` instead.

Plus, I have now added CUDA support (untested).
